announcement.title: Most forgetten month for Ibadah, Month of Shahaban!
announcement.content:
Warm Wishes for the New Year

As the year closes, we pray for peace, progress, and steady growth in our relationship with the Quran. iHafidh now includes UI improvements to help you stay consistent with your reading & memorization.

  • Try the improved Page Mode for structured reading
  • See inline Sajdah markers and themed details for prostration ayahs
  • New HTML-driven announcement system for seasonal events and feature updates
